jv.thirdParty.expr

Class PerThreadHashtable

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.thirdParty.expr.PerThreadHashtable

  • public class PerThreadHashtable
extends java.lang.Object
    Thread-Local hash table.

      PerThreadHashtable() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Hashtable getHashtable()
      Get hash table for current thread, create a new hash table if it does not yet exist.

      Remove hash table for current thread.
